title: Person of Interest Ended with a Powerful Series Finale
author: IGN
comment: Unbelievable show. Truly the best. In the end John gave everything, I didn't want to see him die but he wouldn't have had it any other way. Rest easy John, and thank you for everything.
JOOOOOOOOOOHN!!!!!!!! Caviezel was so great in this role. Episode was just perfect bittersweet finale. One of the greatest TV series I've ever seen with wonderful cast full of terrific actors.
Tears were shed when John died, a hero.
Best show out there. Most realistic ASI ever! And Harold and John are such great moral role models.
Lionel Fusco was the best part of the show
description:
SPOILERS! Matt on the highly emotional and effective conclusion to the series.
